string-array.item: The Xbox 360 is a home video game console developed by Microsoft. The Sony Xperia is an Android smartphone from Sony launched at the 2012 Consumer Electronics Show. It is the first Sony-only branded smartphone after Sony acquired Ericsson's.

The MacBook Pro is a line of Macintosh portable computers introduced in January 2006 by Apple Inc. The MacBook Pro was the second model to be announced during the Appleâ€“Intel transition, after the iMac.

The Acer neoTouch P400 cell phone, launched in February 2010 by Acer, has among its main specifications a TFT screen Resistive Touchscreen, 256K Colors, a resolution of 320x480 points, 3.2 inches with a weight of 125 grams.
The Nexus 4 is a smartphone co-developed by Google and LG Electronics that runs the Android operating system. It is the fourth smartphone in the Google Nexus product family.
The iPad 4 is a tablet computer produced and marketed by Apple Inc. Compared to its predecessor, the third-generation iPad, iPad 4 maintained the Retina Display.
